title: Sometimes unable to play games.(First time today)
body:
The problem showed itself today. The game seems to work just fine, except for seemingly no reason it doesn't sometimes. [Screenshot of what happens when I can't connect.](https://i.gyazo.com/c27d222a0a6e04e6ed210b9b79a4dc46.png) Nothing unusual. The "League of Legends" logo is always at the top of the screen and after a moment the pop-up window appears beneath the logo. I tried disabling my firewall and other programs to no avail. Sometimes it manages to connect after a few minutes, sometimes never.

Info:
- The game worked fine yesterday, and has for one year+. 
- Happens to me on both EUW and EUNE.
- Repairing the files seems to make no difference.
- The Client works like usual, and I'm able to talk to players, even while failing to connect to a game.
- It first happened in a solo ranked game, I was unable to connect until at least 2:40. No issues after that, I ended up winning.
- Thinking the problem resolved itself I queued up but was unable to connect, ended with a remake, and as soon as the remake happened I was sent into the endgame lobby with the rest of the players, I was able to talk with them.

Info from custom game(always solo) tests in order:
Going into a custom game alone as Shadow Evelynn worked 3/3 times.
Going into a custom game alone as Classic Darius worked 1/1 times.
Going into a custom game alone as Classic Darius with a Chroma worked 1/3 times.
Going into a custom game alone as Mordekaiser worked 0/1 times.
Going into a custom game alone as Pentakill Mordekaiser worked 1/1 times.

Game settings:
Video: 1920x1080. Colorblind mode, Relative team colors and character inking on. FPS Cap: 144, all graphics settings set to very high, but Shadows are off.
Sound: Sound is on.


I just want to know a few things:

* Is it a problem on my end, and if so, how do I fix it.

* How do I prevent this from happening again?


EDIT: Just tried to play the overcharge game mode. Didn't work until 01:00. Then it worked perfectly.

EDIT as of 10 hours later: The problem still persists.

replies.body:
It sounds like the main problem isn't exactly an overall connection problem, but more specifically a problem only when your network is connecting to the game servers. Try updating your port forward and DNS settings really quickly using those two steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and if that doesn't help you could test out using a VPN as well to see if that helps any better. 

Let me know what works or doesn't, and we can try a couple more things if needed!

I ran the Hextech Repair Tool and it seemed to have solved the issues. I've played three matchmade games now with no problems. Thank you for your help. 

While I'm here, are you able to give me some information regarding physical challenger rewards for Season 7?
I don't think I've heard anything new recently about the physical rewards, but I'll ask around and be sure to post back if I get some solid info for ya!
